item.title: Customising CV/resume pagedown style
item.description: This will hopefully be helpful for those looking to make their pagedown CV look a little nicer, but don’t want to have to go through the trial and error involved in CSS changes. Here is some CSS that should appear, but not run: .blocks { break-inside: avoid; } This will get the bullet points to line up nicely: [data-id="main"] li { margin-left: 20px; list-style-position: inside; }
